articles.description: Two of Iowa’s Minor League teams will take the field in a place where no Minor Leaguers have played before. Some of each system's best talent will be suiting up for the occasion.
articles.content:

articles.author: Eddie Timanus, USA TODAY
articles.title: Texas at No. 1 was one of odd votes in college football's coaches poll - USA TODAY
articles.description: The preseason USA TODAY Sports AFCA Coaches Poll was full of anomalies. The biggest was Texas being No. 1 but there were many others to include.
